Delayed gastric empty pancreaticoduodenectomy important affect postoperative course QOL . We conduct prospective randomize trial 240 patient underwent pancreaticoduodenectomy compare antecolic retrocolic gastrointestinal reconstruction . The primary endpoint define incidence delay gastric empty ISGPS criterion . The secondary endpoint define incidence postoperative morbidity . Patients recruit study surgery , basis whether pancreatic head resection anticipate pancreatic head periampullary disease , appropriate inform consent obtain . Exclusion criteria 1 ) patient history gastrectomy , 2 ) patient severe cardiorespiratory dysfunction , 3 ) patient liver cirrhosis receive dialysis , 4 ) patient diagnose inadequate study physician .
